title: Κάνε ότι κοιμάσαι
overview: Nikolas is the popular philologist in a non-prestigious high school. After a violent robbery in a neighboring house creates tension in his already strained relationship with his wife and daughter, a series of shocking events begins to unfold. At the same time, he is tormented by his extramarital affair with a mysterious woman; but soon everything changes, since evil lurks, targeting his wife and daughter.
